price: 46. Hij zei: “Vrees niet, Waarlijk! Ik ben met jullie beiden, horend en ziend.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
